statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data
SELECT medication_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold > 100
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT medication_name, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales_data GROUP BY medication_name
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC, transaction_date ASC
SELECT medication_name, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sold FROM sales_data GROUP BY medication_name HAVING total_sold > 500 ORDER BY total_sold DESC

SELECT transaction_date, AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE medication_name LIKE 'Aspirin%' GROUP BY transaction_date HAVING average_sale_amount > 50 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT transaction_id, medication_name, quantity_sold, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC
SELECT MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount, MIN(sale_amount) AS min_sale_amount, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, price FROM medications WHERE price > 50;
SELECT medication_name, manufacturer FROM medications ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT sales_date, quantity FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT medication_name, sales_amount FROM medications INNER JOIN sales_data ON medications.medication_id = sales_data.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY medication_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, manufacturer FROM medications WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY medication_id ASC;
SELECT medication_name, price, manufacturer FROM medications WHERE manufacturer LIKE 'Pfizer%' AND price BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT sales_id, sales_date, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sales_date DESC, sales_amount ASC;
SELECT m.medication_name, s.quantity, s.sales_date FROM medications m JOIN sales_data s ON m.medication_id = s.medication_id WHERE s.quantity > 5 ORDER BY s.quantity DESC, s.sales_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, category FROM medications;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, price FROM medications ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, category, price FROM medications WHERE category = 'Pain Relief';
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT medication_name, manufacturer, price FROM medications WHERE category = 'Painkillers' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT m.medication_name, s.sale_date, s.quantity_sold FROM medications m JOIN sales s ON m.medication_id = s.medication_id WHERE s.quantity_sold > 50;

SELECT m.medication_name, d.forecast_date, d.demand_quantity FROM medications m JOIN demand_forecast d ON m.medication_id = d.medication_id WHERE d.demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY d.forecast_date DESC;
SELECT m.medication_name, s.quantity_sold, d.demand_quantity FROM medications m JOIN sales s ON m.medication_id = s.medication_id JOIN demand_forecast d ON m.medication_id = d.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, price FROM medications WHERE manufacturer IS NULL;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name, price FROM medications ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, medication_id, forecast_date, predicted_demand FROM forecasts WHERE predicted_demand > 100;
SELECT medication_name, manufacturer, price FROM medications WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT medication_name, price FROM medications WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity, total_price FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY total_price ASC;

SELECT medication_name, manufacturer, price FROM medications INNER JOIN forecasts ON medications.medication_id = forecasts.medication_id WHERE forecast_date = '2022-06-15' ORDER BY manufacturer, price;
SELECT medication_name, quantity, total_price FROM medications JOIN sales ON medications.medication_id = sales.medication_id WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT forecast_date, medication_name, predicted_demand FROM forecasts JOIN medications ON forecasts.medication_id = medications.medication_id ORDER BY forecast_date, predicted_demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, unit_price FROM medications ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT rep_name, email FROM sales_representatives WHERE region='East';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity_ordered > 100;
SELECT * FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC, unit_price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT medication_name, manufacturer_name, unit_price FROM medications WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT medication_name, manufacturer_name, unit_price, quantity_sold FROM medications WHERE manufacturer_name = 'ABC Pharma' ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC, unit_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT rep_name, region, phone_number FROM sales_representatives WHERE region IN ('East Coast', 'West Coast') ORDER BY rep_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, location, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
